name: Spring Salad
ingredients: 1 large tomato, diced, or 6 1/2 ounces cherry tomatoes, halved
1/4 cup low carb Italian or Caesar dressing
2 teaspoons granular Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda

instructions.ja: イングリッシュキュウリをさいの目切りにします。

instructions.en: Dice the large tomato or halve the cherry tomatoes.
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte veľké paradajky na kocky alebo prekrojte cherry paradajky na polovicu.
instructions.ja: 大きなトマトをさいの目切りにするか、チェリートマトを半分に切ります。

instructions.en: In a medium bowl, combine the diced cucumber, tomatoes, and chopped green onions.
instructions.sk: V stredne veľkej miske zmiešajte nakrájanú uhorku, paradajky a nasekanú jarnú cibuľku.
instructions.ja: 中サイズのボウルに、さいの目切りにしたキュウリ、トマト、刻んだ青ねぎを入れます。

instructions.en: Add the low carb Italian or Caesar dressing and Splenda to the bowl.
instructions.sk: Pridajte do misky nízkosacharidový taliansky alebo cézar dresing a Splendu.
instructions.ja: ボウルに低炭水化物のイタリアンドレッシングまたはシーザードレッシングとスプレンダを加えます。

instructions.en: Add freshly ground pepper and optional chopped parsley.
instructions.sk: Pridajte čerstvo mleté korenie a voliteľne nasekanú petržlenovú vňať.
instructions.ja: 挽きたての黒コショウと、お好みで刻んだパセリを加えます。

instructions.en: Mix all ingredients together until well combined.
instructions.ja: 全ての材料をよく混ぜ合わせます。

instructions.en: Chill the salad for at least 2 hours or overnight before serving.
instructions.sk: Pred podávaním nechajte šalát chladiť aspoň 2 hodiny alebo cez noc.
instructions.ja: 提供前に少なくとも2時間、または一晩冷やします。

notes: This Spring Salad is a refreshing and light keto-friendly dish that's perfect for warmer weather. The combination of crisp cucumber, juicy tomatoes, and tangy dressing creates a delightful flavor profile. The use of Splenda adds a touch of sweetness without adding carbs. For best results, allow the salad to chill for at least 2 hours or overnight to let the flavors meld together. This salad is versatile and can be served as a side dish or as a light meal on its own. Remember to choose a low-carb dressing to keep this dish keto-friendly. You can also add some feta cheese or sliced avocado for extra flavor and healthy fats.
